paragraphs.text:
import sys.process._
val sqlContext = new org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(sc)
val rawData = sc.textFile("file:///Users/joeblue/sentiment/STREAM/twitter.out")
case class Tweet(screenName: String,timestamp: String, location: String, tweet: String, followers:Integer, polar:Double,subject:Double)
val tweet = rawData.map(s => s.split("\t")).map(
    s => Tweet(  s(0),  s(1),  s(2),  s(3), s(4).toInt,s(5).toDouble,s(6).toDouble)
    ).toDF()
val df2 = tweet.withColumn("Date", (col("timestamp").cast("date")))    
df2.registerTempTable("tweet")

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select date,count(*) from tweet group by date order by date

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select screenName,location,count(*) from tweet where location!='None' group by screenName,location order by count(*) desc

%sql
select * from (select tweet,polar+subject `sentiment` from tweet where polar<0.2 and subject<0.5) order by sentiment
